messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, a pack of rodents have migrated into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Grey April Bomb 75. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's bots/animals has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
